DOC.detailed_description: 32 subject ( F : M=1:1 ) randomize three dose group ( 0.25-0.5-1.0ug/kg/min ) . 8 subject 0.25ug/kg/min group administrate Istaroxime + 0.9 % NS ; 12 subject 0.5ug/kg/min 1.0 ug/kg/min group randomly receive Istaroxime placebo + 0.9 % NS ( 2 subject ) , 0.9 % NS alone ( 2 subject ) Istaroxime + 0.9 % NS ( 8 subject ) . All subject give infusion study drug 24 hour , observe 48 hour clinic . At least 1 week keep two dose group . Escalation high dose occur low dose group complete significant safety issue find .
